thread.title: Dirk Nowitzki As Lurch, and 9 Other Athlete Halloween Costumes We Love
thread.title_full: Dirk Nowitzki As Lurch, and 9 Other Athlete Halloween Costumes We Love | Maxim

author: Adam K. Raymond
title: Dirk Nowitzki As Lurch, and 9 Other Athlete Halloween Costumes We Love
text:
Not all athletes are homicidal maniacs or self-important narcissists, even though it sometimes seems that way. Halloween always provides a good reminder that some athletes aren't pricks and this year a handful of them have already shared pictures of top-notch costumes. Look, what a bunch of down-to-earth guys!
Leading the pack is Dirk Nowitzki, whose Lurch is eerily spot on. It’s not just the clothes and the makeup, but the perfect pose that make this the best athlete costume 2015, a distinction we're sure Dirk will cherish as much as his MVP.
Lurch was in the house last night.... @DannyBMFFL pic.twitter.com/8AHIiNIA3s
— Dirk Nowitzki (@swish41) October 25, 2015 Here are some other players who deserve recognition:
Russell Westbrook as his teammate Steven Adams, and Steven Adams as nurse Joker .
Halloween brothers! pic.twitter.com/2wknqYdVHI
— Steven Adams (@RealStevenAdams) October 25, 2015 Kevin Durant as Martin Lawrence's pizza delivery man in Blue Streak . And Nick Collison as Forrest Gump.
A photo posted by Nick Collison (@nicholascollison) on
Oct 24, 2015 at 9:23pm PDT
T.J. Oshie as a dog and his wife as Cruella de Vil.
Taking my pup for a stroll before the party
A photo posted by Lauren Oshie (@loshie17) on
Oct 25, 2015 at 6:06am PDT
Washington Capital Tom Wilson as...Wilson.
Wilsonnnn!!!! Happy Halloween pic.twitter.com/8lui8Ew6uI
— Tom Wilson (@tom_wilso) October 24, 2015 Chandler Parsons (second from left) as some kind of sexy caveman or something.
#Repost @cvbelieve with @repostapp. ・・・ Trick or Treat
A photo posted by Zaza Pachulia (@zazapachulia) on
Oct 24, 2015 at 10:22pm PDT
Russell Wilson as Batman and Ciara as Catwoman .
Batman To My Rescue ❤️
A photo posted by Ciara (@ciara) on
Oct 26, 2015 at 5:21am PDT
Mavs coach Rick Carlisle as Jim Carrey dressed as Mavs coach Rick Carlisle.
We think Coach Carlisle has finally accepted the fact that he & @JimCarrey are one in the same. #MavsHalloween pic.twitter.com/sXp0qc8mqZ
— Dallas Mavericks (@dallasmavs) October 26, 2015
